title: Claude Opus 4.6 Launch
description: Major model upgrade with improved coding skills, planning abilities, and sustained agentic tasks. Introduces Agent Teams for multiple Claude Code subagents and Fast Mode in research preview.

title: Cowork Research Preview Expanded to Pro Plans
description: Cowork feature, which brings Claude Code's agentic capabilities to Claude Desktop for knowledge work beyond coding, is now available to Pro plan users on macOS.

title: Subagents, Skills, and Image Generation
description: Major release introducing subagents for parallel task execution, Agent Skills for domain-specific workflows, and image generation capabilities. Also includes Cursor Blame for AI attribution on Enterprise plan.

community_feedback.quote: Cursor update changed line endings in entire codebase without consent

title: CLI Agent Modes and Cloud Handoff
description: Significant CLI improvements including Plan and Ask modes, Cloud Agent handoff for background tasks, word-level inline diffs, and one-click MCP authentication.

title: Multi-Agent Support for Claude and Codex
description: Preview support for Claude and OpenAI's Codex coding agents. Pro+ and Enterprise users can run multiple coding agents directly in GitHub, GitHub Mobile, VS Code, and other platforms.

community_feedback.quote: You can now use Claude and OpenAI's Codex in GitHub Copilot with a Pro+ or Enterprise subscription. Pick your agent per task

title: GPT-5.3-Codex Integration
description: GPT-5.3-Codex with 25% faster performance for agentic tasks is now available for Pro and Enterprise users across all platforms.

community_feedback.quote: Starting the week off with a bang: @OpenAIDevs GPT-5.3-Codex just hit @github Copilot. New benchmark highs across coding, agentic, and real-world tasks

title: Wave 14: Arena Mode
description: Introduces Arena Mode for side-by-side model comparison directly in the IDE. Also includes smarter Plan Mode, enhanced Skills support, and bug fixes.

title: Devin Review Auto-Review Settings
description: Auto-review configuration is now accessible as a settings popover directly in the PR header, making it faster to enable or disable auto-reviews per repository.

title: Scheduled Devins
description: Create recurring Devin sessions that run automatically on a schedule. Configure frequency, prompt, and playbook from the new Schedules page in settings.

title: Version 1.3.31 - Subagents and Agent Skills
description: Major release featuring subagents for parallel task execution, agent skills for domain-specific workflows, OpenRouter provider support with dynamic model loading, and numerous bug fixes.

title: Version 0.95.0 - Launch Codex Desktop from CLI
description: Adds ability to launch Codex Desktop directly from the CLI on macOS. Also introduces GPT-5.3-Codex, OpenAI's most capable agentic coding model.

title: Version 0.27.0 - Event-Driven Architecture
description: The CLI now uses a new event-driven scheduler for tool execution for more responsive experience. Includes queued tool confirmations, expandable large text pastes, new /rewind command, and Linux clipboard support with Wayland and X11.

title: Version 0.26.0 - Agents and Skills
description: Introduces agent skills by default with skill-creator skill, generalist agent for improved task routing, rewind through conversation history, /introspect command for debugging, and significant core scheduler refactoring.
